Detailed Description

Timer management Singleton class.

This class is responsible for creating and managing Timers.

Member Function Documentation

void TimerManager::addTimerTime ( const std::string &  name,
const double &  time 
)

Method for manually adding time to a Timer.

Parameters:
name The name of the Timer to add time to.
time The amount of time to add, in seconds.
Remarks:
This will work on timers that are both manually and automatically updated.

void TimerManager::createTimer ( const std::string &  name,
const bool &  manualUpdate = false 
)

Create a new Timer.

Parameters:
name Name of the Timer to be created.
manualUpdate True if the Timer's time is going to be updated manually through the addTimerTime method.
Remarks:
If name is already in use nothing will happen.

Parameters:
